plot outline: Lot of People in the world have a desire to travel to their dream destination, but a lot of them fail to live, achieve it. This is the story of such 4 complete strangers of different age groups who commonly have an emotional attachment with their Royal Enfield bike meet and start their journey together crossing all the odds. In this journey they discover about life, people and love. Their journey inspires and changes the perception of people who opposed their journey.
title: Idhe Maa Katha
